suncertify.business.rmi

Interface RmiService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContractorService, Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RmiServer

    public interface RmiService
extends ContractorService, Remote
    An extension of the ContractorService and Remote interfaces. It's the common interface for any classes in the service layer which need to start an RMI server instance and query the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startServer(int portNumber)
      Start the RMI server on the specified port number.

      • Methods inherited from interface suncertify.business.ContractorService

        book, find

    • Method Detail

      • startServer

        void startServer(int portNumber)
          throws RemoteException
        Start the RMI server on the specified port number.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - the number of the port the server will be active on.
        Throws:
        RemoteException - if an RMI communication-related exception occurs.
